instruction: Describe the features of a Mercedes-Benz S-Class car.
output: The Mercedes-Benz S-Class is a full-size luxury sedan. It features an elegant exterior design with aggressive styling, as well as a luxurious interior with premium materials and craftsmanship. The S-Class is equipped with advanced technology such as a fully digital cockpit with a 12.3-inch infotainment screen, as well as a hybrid powertrain with a 48-volt mild-hybrid system. It also offers advanced driver-assist features such as lane-keeping assist and semi-autonomous cruise control. The S-Class is also equipped with an advanced air suspension system that automatically adjusts the suspension to provide a comfortable ride.
